title: DC59: Behind the scenes testing goes cordless - Official Dyson Video
description: Relentless invention sets Dyson apart, and nowhere does this hold more true than in our cordless line. Watch as Alex Knox, Director of Engineering at Dyson, takes our newest cordless machine, DC59, to task in Dyson's testing laboratory in Malmesbury, UK.

asset.author: Dyson US
asset.hookText:
Relentless invention sets Dyson apart, and nowhere does this hold more true than in our cordless line. Watch as Alex Knox, Director of Engineering at Dyson, takes our newest cordless machine, DC59, to task in Dyson's testing laboratory in Malmesbury, UK. Stacked up against the Electrolux Ergorapido, among others, in tests of suction power, fine dust pick-up, edge cleaning, filtration and versatility, DC59 comes out on top time and time again. 

DC59: Sucks up as much dust as a conventional vacuum.* Without the hassle of a cord.

https://www.dyson.com/dc59
http://www.youtube.com/dysonus
https://www.facebook.com/dyson
https://twitter.com/Dyson
#cutthecord

*To prove this our engineers test for pick up performance across carpets (ASTM F608), hard floors (ASTM F2607) and hard floors with crevices (IEC 60312-1 5.2). To mimic actual use, they load machines with dust before testing (IEC 60312 -- 1 5.9).
